verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Somewhere the sun is shining, Somewhere the songbirds dwell; Hush, then, thy sad repining, God lives, and all is well.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Come day! Some day! We shall behold His glory! Coming again, evermore to reign, All will be wondrous glory!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Soon will earth's night be over, Soon will the morning dawn; Soon will the Christ of Glory Call His redeemed ones home.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: There amid Heaven's beauties They shall behold His face, And through eternal ages Sing of His wondrous grace
